name: Compound Code
description: This field indicates whether or not the dispensed drug was compounded or mixed.

additional: eob.detail.type.coding[N].display = {corresponding description from valueset specified in .system}
fhirMapping.derived: If Compound Code = 1 then eob.detail.type.coding.code = 'RXCINV' if Compound Code = 2 then eob.detail.type.coding.code = 'RXDINV' if Compound Code = 0 then none of the fields in FHIR are set
